title: Creative, Helpful, and Friendly.
description: Krupali's love for the community is amazing. Always cheerful and ready to help, she constantly uplifts others. She is also very creative, and knowledgeable, and ready to lend a hand whenever. Above all things, she is fun! Open-mindedness and kindness are understatements. My go-to person when it comes to open source, technical writing, and comm-UNITY.
